name: The Adventures of Batman & Robin (SegaDC)
description:
Robin & Commissioner Gordon have mysteriously disappeared, and Batman suspects kidnapping. Have our two comrades succumb to the deadly beauty of Poison Ivy? Does the Riddler know the answer? Or will The Joker have the last laugh? Tune in one Sega CD to find out!

Play like you're in the TV series with exclusive animation from the creators of "The Adventures of Batman & Robin!"
